table.name: vtiger_mobile_alerts
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_mobile_alerts` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `handler_path` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `handler_class` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `sequence` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `deleted` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_modules
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_modules` ( `module` varchar(50) NOT NULL , `valid` int(1) NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`module`));

table.name: vtiger_vtemobile_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_vtemobile_settings` ( `module_settings` text, `settings_fields` text NULL, `settings_address_fields` text NULL, `google_authenticator` INT(3) NULL, `related_settings` text, `default_module` VARCHAR(100) NULL, `isnew` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `header_fields` text NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_vtemobile_filters
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_vtemobile_filters` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userid` int(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `module` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `filter_data` text NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
